channel.title: CVE Feed for Agustin Berasategui -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-49240|2024-10-18T13:37:42.181Z -- agustin%20berasategui -- ab%20categories%20search%20widget
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Agustin Berasategui AB Categories Search Widget allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects AB Categories Search Widget: from n/a through 0.2.5.
